episode.title: Nolde Brothers, Inc. v. Local No. 358, Bakery & Confectionary Workers Union, AFL-CIO

section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Chief Justice Warren E. Burger

turn.speaker: warren_e_burger
turn.label: Chief Justice Warren E. Burger
turn.text: The judgment and opinion of the Court in 75-1198, Nolde Brothers Incorporated against Local 358 of the Bakery and Confectionery Workers.
For reasons stated and an opinion filed with the clerk this morning, the judgment of the United States Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit is affirmed.
Mr. Justice Stewart, with whom Mr. Justice Rehnquist joined, filed a dissenting opinion.
